title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 752.2 - Maximum lease term
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 752.2 - Maximum lease term

State Regulations

Unless otherwise authorized by law, the term of any lease, license, concession or other agreement for the use of property or facilities
under the jurisdiction of the Hudson River Park Trust shall not exceed 30 years
in duration. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
752.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
